full on off stump, driven to short cover
loopy delivery that falls on leg stump, defended with the bat's open face
good length on middle, the batsman is quick to adjust to the length, and shuffles towards the leg side, but playing the late cut to the ball that stayed slightly low
Gets a piece of that one! Full on off stump and Haris was quick to pounce onto that one. Charges down the wicket, and slogs that over long on's head.
good comeback from the spinner. Full just outside off, and spins away from Haris' slashing blade
full on off stump, prods forward and defends towards short cover
full on off stump, carefully defended off the front foot

back of a length just outside off, straightens slightly and Hasan Ali punches that down the ground! Slightly awkward feet movement, as he moves to the leg side, but enough to free his arms. Sends that down the ground, past Sandakan
full outside off, spins into Hasan's body. Defended off the back foot
full outside off, no spin and that's swept confidently to sweeper-fielder on the leg side
full just outside off, defended off the front foot
full on leg stump, goes down the leg side. Sharp spin
full outside off, no footwork, but punched to point
full just outside off, defended back to Herath
full on middle stump, Hasan does well to keep his eyes on the ball while defending
tossed up full on middle and Hasan can't resist the flight. Frees his arms, and slogs that past mid on's right for another boundary. Not timed well enough, but found the gap
Glorious! Full outside off and Hasan gets down on one knee to slog that over Herath's head. Keeps his eyes on the ball as he swings the bat through the ball's line. Dispatched
full just outside off, defended
full on off stump, defended with the bat's open face
short outside off, anticipates the turn and cuts the ball past point's left. Exquisite shot, played late
very full outside off, Sohail tries the extravagant drive but it takes the under edge and goes along the ground to first slip
full just outside off, defended
back of a length on off stump, straightens on middle and Haris tucks that to mid on off the back foot. Moves to 49
tossed up full on off stump, opens the bat's face and bunts it towards point
wayward, full outside leg stump and Hasan sweeps that fine. Short fine leg needs to give it a chase, but Perera does well to keep it for less than four
full on middle stump, presents the straight face of the bat
good length on leg stump, turns away from him as he tucks that to short fine leg. And that's fifty for the debutant!

full on middle and Hasan is enjoying himself! Gets down on one knee and dispatches that over cow corner for a six. Finds the elevation in that shot, and it was six as soon as it left his bat. A nifty innings here
pulls the length back this time, it's just outside off and despite his charge, Hasan can only defend

Herath, who?! That's what Hasan must be thinking, as he sends that over long on for six more. It's wide outside off but Hasan gets his front foot slightly square and smashes that. Full swing of the bat. Sarfraz smiles from the pavillion.

And Herath tells Hasan exactly who he is! Five-for for Herath. Back of a length just outside off, straightens down the line and Hasan was trying to defend with the spin. Goes just past his bat's outside edge, and the keeper dislodges the bails as Hasan's back foot is outside
back of a length outside off stump, defended off the back foot
good length on off stump, works that off his pads to the sweeper on the leg side but refuses the single
full outside off, driven square to deep point. No fielder inside the circle on the off side except mid off
good length outside off, defended off the back foot
back of a length just outside off, punched down the ground and allows Haris to take the single. Abbas will have to survive just one ball of this over.
back of a length just outside off, defended off the back foot. Abbas survives this one, but it's a no ball. He will need to see off another delivery
yorker on middle stump, tails into the toes, but it's dug out very well
back of a length on leg stump, tucked towards the square leg umpire but Haris is disinterested in the run
quicker one on leg stump, defended off the back foot
full on leg stump, charges down the ground and effectively yorks himself.
full on middle stump, defended with the bat's straight face
full on leg stump, defended to short mid on

full on middle stump, Haris charges and drives down the ground but it's in the air! Falls just short of the bowler, who dives in front but can't get his fingers to the ball. Dropped! Importantly, Haris will not be on strike next over.
back of a length on off stump, comes onto the batsman's body as he fends that towards gully off the back foot
full on middle stump, defended back to the bowler, but it's another no ball from Pradeep
short and into Abbas' body. Cramps him for space, as the batsman somehow turns it behind to short fine leg for a single. Gets off strike
very full outside off, opens the bat's face and directs the ball along the ground to third man
short on middle stump, ducks
short outside off and Haris clatters that. Tries to send that over cow corner, but top edges instead. Lucky that the ball fall just behind the fielder at mid on

full outside off, ramps that towards point and calls early for the single, thinking it's the last ball. But no, it's another no ball. Abbas will have to face one ball from Pradeep. That run, too, was a close one.
full on off stump, very well defended by Abbas off the front foot. A simple defense
back of a length outside off, firmly punched to deep cover but Haris refuses the single
full on off stump, defended
back of a length outside off, shuffles in front of middle stump and defends off his back foot
back of a length on middle stump, punches that straight back to Dilruwan

full on middle stump, uses his feet well to charge down the wicket, and it's clattered past cover for four. Timed to perfection, and goes past mid off and the fielder at cover. Superlative followthrough as well. Pakistan breach 400.
good length on off stump, spins into him as it is defended back to Dilruwan. Abbas to take strike next over
good length just outside off, Abbas carefully fends that off the back foot
tossed up on off stump, defended and takes the inside edge off his bat and into his front pad. Big appeal

full outside off, defends the ball as it hits his blade, and onto his pad (or boot), and sharply held by silly point. Herath appeals for the caught but umpire Llong is not sure. He goes to the third umpire, soft signal not out. Replays show bat, pad, boot, but also the ground, before going to Kaushal. Not out, then.
full on leg stump, misses the defense and hits his pad, but it was going down the leg side
tossed up full on off stump, yorker actually, which is well dug out
full on off stump, defended
full on middle, gets behind the line of the ball before defending
back of a length outside off stump, cut fine to deep point
full on leg stump, going down the leg side as Haris gets out of the ball's way
full on middle stump, defended off the front foot
full outside leg stump, the batsman cramps himself as he tries to come down the pitch. Punched back to Dilruwan

A six to finish the over. Good length on off stump and this time Haris does not miss out. Dances down and swings along the ball's line. It was in his arc, and Haris does not miss out. Punished over long off for six more. Time for drinks
full on off stump, spins away from the tailender, lets it go
full outside off, defended with soft hands
full on off stump, stays really low and Abbas

full on middle stump, spins into his body and raps him on the pads but it seems like it would've gone down leg. Umpire says not out, but Chandimal reviews. Hits the pad on middle and leg according to the replay. No edge, either. It all depends on HawkEye now..and it clips the leg stump and it's umpire's call. Not out.
full on off stump, defended off the front foot
full just outside off, defended along the ground
good length outside off, slower ball, and left alone
back of a length on middle stump, defended off the back foot. Firmly played back to Lakmal
short and wide outside off, cut well to deep point but chooses not to run. Extensive farming of strike going on here
back of a length on middle stump, shuffles slightly back and defended off the back foot
back of a length on middle stump, defended off the back foot
yorker on middle and leg, squeezed towards fine leg
full just outside off, spins slightly away but left alone
full outside off, left alone once again as the ball safely goes through to the keeper
full just outside off, defended off the back foot
full on leg stump, defended towards mid on
full outside off, spins away from Haris as he tries to drive. Misses everything and the keeper too, but Haris does not want the bye
full outside middle, driven straight to cover
Right on cue, short ball first up. Ducks well
full outside off, defended to short cover
Back of a length on middle stump, defended off the front foot
full outside off, defended with soft hands
short ball on off stump but stays low after Abbas ducks. Just goes over the tall man's head. Awkward bounce for the keeper too
full on leg stump, ducks
full, flighted on middle stump, slight spin and easily defended
full and wide outside off, left alone
full outside off stump, charges down the ground and mistimes the ball, slicing it over mid off for one. Almost went to the fielder at long on
back of a length on leg stump, worked off the back foot to mid on
wayward, short and going down leg stump. A rare leg-side wide in Test cricket
full on middle and leg, tries to stay in shape as he lofts that over the bowler's head for a single. Ensured that the ball was played straight
yorker on leg stump, gets his bat down just in time
full outside leg stump, defended
full on leg stump again, defended with soft hands
full on middle stump, defended towards mid off
full on off stump, no spin, and easily defended
full and wide outside off, ramped to point and Haris was not interested in the single. But there's a slight misfield, but no, no single nonetheless
full outside off, driven square past point. Came down the wicket and opened his arms
full on off stump, worked towards fine leg but takes his pad instead
tossed up full on off stump, defended from near his body
full outside off, pinged to point. Pakistan have kept open fields for Haris to run, but he is not at all interested
full just outside off, prods his front foot forward and defends
short outside off, rocks back and completes a beautiful square cut. Goes past point for four more Pakistan take the lead!
full outside off, charges down the wicket and slices that waywardly over cover's head. Lands safe
full just outside off, driven with the bottom hand to short cover
full on off stump, is quick to get his front foot forward, and defends
full on middle and leg, defended. No real spin at this stage
good length on middle, Abbas rocks backs and brings out the backfoot defense
full just outside off, defended off the front foot
good length on off stump, does well to block out the whole over. Defended again
full on off stump, driven down the ground to long off
back of a length on middle, defended

It's all over. Haris falls for 76! Full on middle stump and the batsman tries to hoick that over long on. It's mistimed, and in the air! Mid off races to his right, and takes the catch. Pakistan finish with a lead of three runs.
back of a length in the corridor, tapped into the off side
full and slightly shaping away from off stump, flicked straight to midwicket
good length, in the corridor. Left alone
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
back of a length in the corridor, slight lift off the surface, no sideways movement. Left alone
good length at off stump, slight wobble away, but nothing menacing. Easily defended
good length, wide outside off stump, left alone
short and wide outside off stump, sliced straight to backward point
good length at middle stump, shuffles and pushes wide of mid-on
good length, slanted across the corridor. Left alone
back of a length outside off stump, left alone
back of a length at off stump, defended down the pitch
nearly gets the edge. Looks to defend on the back foot outside off, but this one climbs from a length and sails past the bat
back of a length, angled in at Silva and cuts through his defence. Big gap between bat and body, this flies over off stump
back of a length outside off stump, left alone
good length outside off, reaches out at it and is beaten on the outside edge. Ball doesn't carry to Sarfraz
back of a length in the corridor, pushed to point off the back foot
length at leg stump, flicked to long leg
good length at middle stump, angled in. Thick inside edge as he hangs his bat in front of the body
good length at middle stump, squeezed into the leg side
good length outside off stump, defended off the outside half
good length, angled in at the corridor. Defended to extra cover
good length at middle stump, defended into the leg side
short and wide, nice connection on the cut but backward point stops with an outstretched right hand
good length and in the channel, defended off the outside half of the bat
good length at leg stump, defended into the leg side
back of a length outside off, stabbed to point with an arched back
good length, in the corridor. Pushes forward and defends to extra cover
short and down leg side, ducks under it
back of a length and in at middle stump, takes the bottom hand off as this thuds into the inner half of his bat and dribbles past short leg
good length, angled in at off stump, Defended from the crease, down the pitch
full at middle stump, driven on the up to mid-on
back of a length in the corridor, defended into the off side from the crease
bouncer is well short at middle stump, ducks under it and this one makes even Sarfraz leap to gather
good length at off stump, solidly behind it to defend
loose shot. Chases this length ball outside off. No movement there, but he's chasing and he's beaten
back of a length in the corridor, defended into the off side
back of a length in the corridor, defended off the back foot
full and in the corridor, blocked on the front foot
full and angled in at middle stump, skews it off the inside half, wide of mid-on
back of a length and into the leg stump, tucked off his hips and a chase for midwicket
back of a length in the corridor, tapped on the up to point
nearly takes off stump. Goes wide of the crease, angles it back in from a length. Karunaratne either left this with trust in the bounce, or he had no clue. He's safe
back of a length in the corridor, defended into the off side
good length at off stump, punched to mid-off on the up
short one at middle stump, pulls it with control, gets it wide of fine leg
offcutter, full outside off stump. Pushed to extra cover. Picked the variation
misses the pull shot. This was similar to the ball that got Sarfraz, but with the sting of a new seam. Short and nips away, probably saves him in the process
short one again, and this time he's on top of the bounce. Bunts it with a flat bat to deep square
good length outside off stump, defended into the covers
length, angled in at off stump. Pushed into the covers off the front foot
yorker fired in at the toes, but nicely clipped to deep square
back of a length in the corridor, defended into the off side
full at off stump, head falls into the off side, but he maintains control as he flicks. Gets it wide of deep square and runs confidently
offcutter outside off, left alone. It rolls through to Sarfraz
goes wide of the crease and bowls it full at middle, whipped to deep midwicket
back of a length in the corridor, pushed off the back foot to point
back of a length outside off, waits a while and then dabs it wide of backward point

Masood jumps backwards at short leg and holds on. Wide of the crease from Yasir, gets it on a length outside off. KArunaratne looks to use the angle and flick it away, but his stride is not big enough. Allows it to get big on him, gets an inside. It lobs over Masood off his pads, but there's enough time for him to turn and get both hands on it....replays show Karunaratne hasn't nicked it. He walked. When he attempted the shot, he jammed the bat into the pitch. Replays show that was the only impact. Ball was nowhere close to bat or glove.
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
back of a length outside off, climbs and bounces into his body. A nervous push and then  a retreat as this pings into his body
good length outside off stump, pushed to point with an open face
good length, angled in at leg stump. Flicked to fine leg
back of  a length, down leg side, avoided
good length, angled across off stump. Left alone
full at middle stump, flicks it wide of square leg and they hesitate. But the fielder had some diving and recovering to do and Silva runs back after being stopped halfway down the pitch
good length at off stump, dead-batted into the leg side
full at off stump, defended to extra cover
back of a length outside off, cut straight to point
short and wide outside off, spins too far away for him to attempt a shot
tossed up outside off stump, left alone
tossed up at middle stump, defended into the leg side
back of a length at leg stump, whipped off the back foot through square leg
good length at off stump, defended into the off side
back of a length in the corridor, defended off the back foot
short one outside off, doesn't rise. He plays the pull and gets it off the inside half. Dangerous shot, but he survives. Pulled from well outside off, down to fine leg
good length in the corridor, defended into the off side
good length at off stump, defended into the off side
glorious shot. This is full and outside off stump, he gets on one knee, transfers the weight forward and down and drills this to the cover boundary
good length at off stump, spins a long way past the outside edge
back of a length at off stump, pushed off the back foot to point
good length at middle stump, steps out and pushes it to mid-on with soft hands
good length, pitches at middle stump and spins down leg side, past the inside edge as he pokes at this

oh he's almost lost his off stump. That's not a good shot at all. Good length, pitches way outside off and he's looking to drive this through the covers. Nowhere near the pitch and this sneaks through the gap
good length at off stump, dances around in the crease a bit and defends this very, very late
short and wide outside off, slight reverse swing. Shoulders his arms
back of a length just outside off, comes into the batsman, who defends it off his back foot. Quick to get inside the line of the delivery
back of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot
short and wide outside off, pushes the ball square between point and cover. Always in control

short outside off and angles into the batsman's body. Sends him ducking as the ball goes just over his helmet. Sarfraz does well to grab that. The batsman was in no position to connect that, and it could've easily taken the bat's outside edge, or the glove
short once again, but slightly outside off this time, the batsman is quick to get out of the ball's way
full outside off, goes straight through as the batsman lets it go
back of a length on middle and leg, straightens after pitching, rocks back and pulls that along the ground to the sweeper at square leg
full outside off, defended with soft hands on the off side and calls early for the one. Attentive cricket
full on off stump, sharp legspin but the batsman had the spin covered. Defended off the front foot
full just outside off, spins sharply away as the batsman considers poking at it. Goes just past his outside edge
full on middle stump, defended with ease off the front foot
short outside off, defended off the back foot with the open face of the bat. Goes towards point
short on off, rises onto the batsman, who defends that from near his chest
good length on off stump, angles into the left hander, who tucks the ball square
pitched short on off stump, ducks to get away
back of a length just outside off, defended off the back foot

banged short once again but does not bounce as much, given how short he pitched it. Kaushal Silva takes no chances, as he ducks for cover, but the ball goes inches over his head. The keeper and Hasan have a giggle
full just outside off, spins into Thirimanne, but he works it off his back foot to midwicket
short and wide outside off, sharp legspin as the batsman rocks back and punches in front of square off his back foot. Calls early for the single
full just outside off, dances down and drives while at it. Straight to cover
full on middle and leg, slightly straightens and the batsman does well to get behind the ball's line. Defended tentatively, but safe. Stayed low as well
good length on middle, rocks back and looks to work it towards short fine leg
full on off stump, worked with the bat's open face towards point
short outside off, left alone as the ball goes through to Sarfraz
not surprising then that he pitches it short, goes down the leg side as the batsman shoulders his arms.
good length just outside off, easily defended
short on middle stump, rocks back and pings it straight to midwicket

flighted just outside off and the batsman prods forward to tentatively defend it. But it takes the outside edge! Sarfraz collects and Thirimanne has to go! The part-timer strikes. The ball spins slightly away from him, and takes a feather as the ball goes past his blade.
full on middle and leg, stays slightly slow. Gets his feet inside the crease and tucks it on the leg side. Straight to short leg
full on off stump, goes straight through and forces the batsman to defend off the back foot
full on middle and leg, gets his front stride in and defended
spin on offer! Pitches full on middle and goes sideways. Sarfraz collects well. The batsman lets it go
full on middle, defended
a ripper on middle stump, rocks back and cuts square. Wahab races but there's a misfield inside the circle, allowing the extra run
back of a length on off stump, carves it square and it goes into the gap past point. Wahab Riaz has more chasing to do
full just outside off, tries to work it on the leg side but takes the leading edge and was in the air, slightly. Falls just in front of midwicket
full on middle, rocks back and tucks it behind square near the umpire for a single
good length just outside off, innocuous spin into his body, defended towards the leg side
short outside off, straightens and it's punched off the back foot. Shafiq races to his left to field that
full just outside off, defended off the front foot
full just outside off, driven down the ground, but straight to mid on
full just outside off, slight spin away, worked towards short cover
back of a length outside off, enough room to cut that off the back foot, but straight to point
back of a length on off stump, carved towards cover and calls early for one
very full just outside off, Kaushal is lucky that his shouldered arms did not cause a dismissal. Goes just past his pad and bat
full leg stump, looks to work it towards midwicket but takes the leading edge to cover. Falls just short
full on middle stump, big stride forward and defended before the spin could come into play
good length on middle, shuffles towards the off side and tucks it square. Goes straight to midwicket
full outside off stump and it's stays very, very low. Sharp spin into the right-hander's body, and he does well to get bat to ball
short on off stump, goes deep into the crease and muscles that onto the leg side. Sweeper cleans that up
full and fast on middle stump, glances it to fine leg as the ball appeared to go down the leg side
back of a length just outside off, gets inside the line of the ball and punches it straight back to Shafiq

back of a length on leg stump, spins further away down the leg side and the batsman looks to feather it, but decides against it. May just have gotten a glove to it, but Sarfraz can't hold onto it either
full on leg stump, defended back to Haris
tossed up full outside off, eases into the drive. But straight to point

full outside off, good use of his feet to drive to cover. Wahab Riaz collects and throws it in quick, but it's a bad throw! It was powerfully thrown to the non-striker's, but the wide throw goes to cow corner for four more. Haris Sohail was ready for the throw, but Wahab's release was really powerful.
good length on middle, defended
short and wide outside off, left alone by the batsman. But spins sharply
full just outside off, defended off the front foot with soft hands
full just outside off, defended off the front foot but the ball goes towards the leg side instead.
good length on middle stump, spins towards the leg side and takes the side of the bat, it's in the air, but goes just past the stretched left hand of leg slip
full and wide outside off, frees his arms and pings that over the bowler's head, and past mid on for four. Not quite the best connection, gets the bottom of the blade, but enough power in that shot
full on leg stump, quick to defend it with the open stance, given that Shafiq is bowling around the wicket
short on middle stump, rocks back and defends it back to the bowler
flatter, full on middle, defended back to Shafiq
full on leg stump, sharp turn after pitching, defended craftily

full on leg stump and spins sharply once again, Kaushal misses the sweep completely, and he is struck on the pads in front of off stump. Would've gone on to break middle and leg. Another part-timer strikes.
full just outside off, defended off the back foot
back of a length on middle stump, steps back into the crease and tucks the ball towards the square leg umpire
full on middle, gets deep into his crease and glances the ball to midwicket. A wicket-maiden
full on off stump, stays slightly low. Mendis is wary about the turn and plays the defense with soft hands
short on middle, steps back and carves the ball to point
full on leg stump, gets his big stride in, and defended back to Yasir
tossed up full on middle, brings out the inside-out drive, but straight to cover
full on middle, good technique from Mendis. Firmly defended despite the lack of bounce
short on middle, a bit of legspin that allows him to cut the ball square. But straight to point. Time for the day's last drinks break.
full on middle, bunted down the ground to mid on
full just outside off, defended with soft hands
short and wide outside off, cut square and calls early. Cover fields well, but almost takes out Yasir Shah, at short mid off, with the throw
full outside the leg stump, goes down the leg side
good length on middle, straightens and the batsman is clueless. Misses the defense, and hits him in front of middle stump. Loud appeal, too, but I suspect it was too high
good length on middle, defended off the back foot
full on off stump, defended off the front foot
back of a length just outside off, goes deep to cut. But straight to point. Too close to his body to find any direction or power in that shot
full on off stump, driven to cover's left. Sri Lanka now lead by fifty
full on off stump, spins slightly away as he drives with the spin to cover
yorker on middle stump, smartly dug out by Mendis
full on off stump, prods forward and defends firmly
full on leg stump, gets his toes out of the way before bunting it back to the bowler
full on leg stump, worked to backward square off the back foot
good length on middle and off, no real turn as Chandimal gets behind the line and punches back to the bowler
full on middle and leg, tries to tuck that to midwicket, but the leading edge sends it back to the bowler
Oh, my, my! Full on off stump, straightens and bounces after pitching. Takes the outside edge of his bat, but luckily (for Mendis), it falls in front of square. Silly point would've gobbled that up
full on off, defended off the back foot
full on middle, gets on top of the ball, and defends
full on off stump, defended carefully as the ball stays low
full just outside off, punched to cover
full just outside off, carves the drive on the up. But straight to the fielder at point
short and wide outside off, plays with the turn as he cuts it between point and cover. Loud call for the double
good length on middle, steps deep into the crease and tucks it in front of square on the leg side. Big gaps in that region as mid on has to run towards cow corner to retrieve
good length on off stump, no real spin as it is worked off his pads to midwicket for a single
back of a length on middle, defended off the back foot to the bowler
full on middle and leg, driven smartly, but straight to mid off
full on middle stump, defended with soft hands
back of a length just outside off, rocks back and punches down the ground
full on middle, punched towards mid on off the back foot
Full on off stump, driven back to Amir off the front foot
pushed full just outside off, comfortably driven on the up. But straight to mid off
back of a length outside off, angles into the batsman, as he defends that off the back foot. Punched towards short cover
short on middle, rises onto the batsman, who does well to tuck it fine towards the umpire at backward square. Fine leg races in to throw it in
short on middle, stays low and allows him to work it off his hips to the sweeper behind square on the leg side
back of a length just outside off, a straight one, and left alone
full just outside off, defended back to to Yasir. It was almost a full toss
full outside off, muscled to mid on off the back foot
looped on leg stump, sharp spin and deceives the batsman. He tried to defend that towards the leg side, but a leading edge takes it towards point
very full on middle stump, gets bat to ball quickly. A quicker ball
looped on middle stump, it's full and turns sharp. Defended with soft hands, as the ball flies behind square on the off side
quicker one to finish that over, back of a length just outside off, defended off the back foot
back of a length outside off, punched to short cover
pitched short on off stump, ducks. Quick stuff from Amir
short outside off and this one's too high. One bouncer for the over, says umpire Kettleborough
full outside off, but good shape away from the right hander this time. Shoulders his arms.
back of a length outside off stump, opens the bat's face and the ball trickles down to gully
full on middle, it's going down leg side but the batsman tries to glance at it. Almost got the edge, or the glove, but eventually touches nothing as the ball goes to a diving Sarfraz's gloves
full on off stump, works it in front of square on the leg side and calls early for the single
flighted, full on leg stump, tucked away square to deep midwicket for more runs. They run three as Amir has to retrieve
full on middle and off, defended from close to the ground, allowing him to play it very safely
back of a length on off stump, goes deep into his crease and works it to midwicket for another single

A beautiful delivery gets the wicket of Chandimal! It was flighted on middle and leg, Chandimal adjusts his front foot to work it in front of square on the leg side, but sharp turn - coupled with minimal foot movement - helps the ball take the outside edge of his straight bat. Loops to first slip, who makes no mistake. The captain has to go.
short outside off, no spin this time as Lakmal biffs the ball to mid on off the back foot
full on middle, worked off his toes towards the leg side in front of square

back of a length just outside off, sharp swing into the right hander's body, jags back in quite a lot, and Mendis will feel lucky his shouldered arms did not cost him a dismissal. Goes just past off stump
full on middle and off, easily clipped off his toes to deep midwicket

short one this time, and it's the slower one. Lakmal's eyes light up, as he tries to pull it . Hits him near his stomach, and goes straight to leg gully. Some of the fielders thought he had gotten bat to that
back of a length just outside off, defended off the back foot
sharp reverse swing, yorker on off stump, Lakmal does well to squeeze that out
good length on middle stump, sharp legspin. Defended off the back foot with the bat's open face
good length on middle and off, carefully worked towards the leg side, ensuring the ball stay along the ground

short just outside off, cut square but straight to point. They go for the run, and Masood throws it in quickly. Is it a run out? The third umpire says no. Lakmal's dive pays off, as he reaches the crease a few seconds before Sarfraz took the bails off
full on off stump, driven uppishly to mid off
full on middle, defended
full on middle and off, gets on top of the ball and defends that after getting his big stride in
back of a length just outside off, shoulders his arms
full outside off, late tail into the batsman's body, driven on the up. Goes back to the bowler
back of a length wide outside off, Mendis considers poking at that but chooses not to as he pulls his bat back at the last moment
full just outside off, firmly defended off the front foot
full outside off, shoulders his arms but the ball gets some extra bounce after going past the bowler
full on off stump, defended
full on off stump, sharp spin and bounce away from Lakmal. The batsman does well to leave that
full just outside off, it's the straight one this time, defended off the back foot.
tossed up, full on off stump, tentatively defended off the front foot

tossed up full outside leg stump, Lakmal pads that, as the ball goes straight to silly point. The infielders appeal for the catch, but the blade was nowhere near the ball. They consider going for the review, but better sense prevails. Replays show that Lakmal had gotten glove to that.
full on leg stump, tucked through square leg for two runs as short leg (with his helmet on) has to run to the deep to bring the ball back
full just outside off, defended towards point with the bat's open face. And that's stumps on day four.
good length, in the corridor. Nice long stride and he defends
full and tailing in at leg stump, shorter stride this time as he clips this past short midwicket
full and in at off stump, tapped towards mid-on
good length outside off stump, 125 kph, lets it go and it barely makes it to the keeper
length at off stump, defends off the outside half of the bat
good length outside off, covers the off stump, lets it go
back of a length, skids through at middle stump. Pushed to midwicket off the back foot
good length at middle stump, defended on the front foot
full at off stump, defended down the pitch
good length outside off, draws him forward, but can't get him to play. Big turn
back of a length at middle stump, deep in the crease as he shovels this wide of square leg
good length on off, slight turn away, but comfortably defended with a closed face
full outside off stump, gratefully left alone
good length, slight shape away in the off stump channel. Defended to gully off the outside edge
good length outside off, left alone. This one was angled in
lobbed towards fine leg but the timing was so off on this hook shot that he's safe. This lifted at his throat and he swivelled as he played the shot
beats the outside edge. Goes slightly wider on the crease than he usually does. Angles it in but there's late movement away as it pitches on a good length. Draws Mendis outside off and beats him

Mendis has been given out lbw and he has reviewed it. This one jagged back in, same line and length at the previous one. Beats the inside edge this time and traps him on the back pad. He was playing from the crease. If anything saves him here, it'll be an inside edge or the line of impact...there's no edge. On to tracking. Impact umpire's call! They've got Mendis inside 15 minutes. HUGE wicket. He shuffles across like he normally does but his feet weren't warm enough yet by the way he moved. It was a lazy shot in the end. Marginally in line, though. Wouldn't be overturned if he was given not out.
length at off stump, defended on the front foot
length at middle, defended into the leg side
googly heads for middle stump after pitching back of a length, defended off the inside half of the bat
good length at off stump, defended off the outside half
good length, angled down leg side. It's a slider. He can't get bat to it. Deflects off the pad and then the keeper
good length, swinging away in the corridor. Defended off the back foot

swings back in. He's using the reverse nicely here. Both ways. This one comes in from a good length outside off. Strikes him on the back leg, but it was climbing over off. He was looking to chop it, on line
well played. Gets a short one, swivels on the back foot, uses the time available on this pitch to watch it closely and swats it away to the long leg boundary
back of a length in the corridor, defended off the back foot
full and swinging in at middle, but nicely flicked past short midwicket
good length at middle stump, flicked through midwicket on the up
good length outside off, shuffles and looks to sweep. This spins down leg side from above his bat
back of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
good length outside off, looks to sweep, cops it on the shoulder
good length outside off, looks to sweep, gets it on the forearm and lands in front of short fine
back of a length outside off stump, shuffles and cops it on the back leg. Outside off stump
looks to sweep again, exposing all the stumps. It spins down leg and past his bat once more
short and well wide outside off. Looks to pummel it on the up through midwicket, but he toe-ends it down the pitch
bouncer, takes it on. Can't get bat on it
full outside off, tapped to mid-on on the up, with a closed face
back of a length in the corridor, defended off the back foot down the pitch
offcutter, good length outside off. Defended into the covers
bouncer, doesn't take it on this time. Left alone
flicks aerially but it's too quick for short leg. He went on the back foot and picked this from middle stump
back of a length, sliding in at middle stump. Defended off the back foot
good length outside off stump, covers the off stump as he lets it go
good length, skids down leg side and pas this attempted flick
tossed up outside off stump, dead-batted into the pitch
good length outside off stump, looks to block on the front foot - beaten on the outside edge
bouncer at an off stump line, controls the hook and gets it to deep square's left
edged and through the cordon. This is full outside off and he looks to drill the cover drive. Thick outside edge, barely rises to shin level. Wouldn't have been caught even if third slip was in there
good length, shaping in from outside off. Big stride to cover the off stump as he lets it go

hooks straight to square leg. Lakmal has been positive and taken that shot on, but the truth is this isn't his speciality. He's won the short ball battle the last five or six times, but this time the bowler prevails. Short one at middle stump and he connects it nicely. More static in his crease than the previous hook shots. Can't place it though and that's the end of him
sneaks through from under the inside edge. Angled bat from Perera first up. He's looking to slash this through point when he sees the line and length, but this swings back in. Welcome to the party
good length outside off, and it doesn't rise at all after bouncing. Through to the keeper
good length outside off stump, fails at another sweep attempt. This one into his body
full outside off stump, swept to deep square
good length outside off stump, stretches forward and watches it spin a long way past the outside edge

oh nearly bowled. What a bowler this guy is. Shows him the spin first ball, then slides the next one in at off stump. Perera is one the back foot, shaping to cut. Somehow gets an inside edge to save his off stump from doom
tossed up outside off stump, looks to reverse sweep. Gets a top edge that floats wide of slip
back of a length at middle stump, dabbed to square leg off the back foot
good length, swinging in slightly, but too far outside off. Left alone
back of a length outside off, bends in and straightens. Left alone
looks for the yorker, but misses his length slightly. It's a full toss, clipped to deep square
full at off stump, full face as he taps this to mid-on
good length at off stump, bunted to mid-on from the crease
short at middle stump, checks the hook shot. Finds backward square leg
good length outside off stump, stretches forward and gets an inside edge on the defensive
good length, wide outside off. Dabbed to short third off the back foot
good length outside off stump, gets glove on the attempted sweep. Rolls past short fine
full at leg stump, defended to silly point
good length, drifts in at off stump. Rips past the outside edge as he tries to defend
tossed up at off stump, defended into the covers
good length, swinging in at off stump. Defended from the crease
short and just outside off, sliced off the back foot. Gully dives to his left and stops it
good length, swinging in at the corridor. Sweetly timed push on the up, straight to mid-off
goes wide of the crease, bowls it short and wide outside off. But it doesn't rise as he looks to cut. Sneaks through from under the blade
full and angled in at off stump, pushed to mid-off
wide of the crease, slanted into off stump. Back of a length. Pushed to midwicket off the back foot
short and wide outside off stump, on the back foot. Pulled through midwicket off the toe-end of the bat. Nice job coming back for the third.
good length outside off, steps out and pushes to mid-off
full outside off stump, swept into short leg and it deflects to short fine
back of a length at middle stump, dropped into the leg side off the back foot
superb. Sarfraz predicted last over that Dickwella would start stepping out. He's done it brilliantly so far. This time he meets it at middle stump and hammers it past the non-striker
length at off stump, paddle sweep, straight to short fine
full at middle stump, defended to midwicket
past the outside edge. Good length, slanted across off stump. Stretches forward to push into the off side

dropped at second slip! Oh Amir, doesn't even have anything to say. Happens that often. Back of a length in the corridor, pokes at it and gets a thick outside edge that's heading towards first slip. But Asad Shafiq leaps to his left and puts it down. The pace of the pitch is the reason. It was hanging up for quite a while and he grabbed at it
length at middle stump, defended from the crease
good length at off stump, pushed into the covers on the front foot
length at middle stump, defended into the leg side

good length outside off, sweep, lobs past short leg who was taking evasive action. This was off the top egde and into the helmet. Fielder looking to his left as he tried getting out of the way. Ball falls to his right
length, off stump, blocked on the front foot
good length at middle stump, defended down the pitch

struck in front, given out. Reviews straight away. He's hardly put in a stride and it's plumb in terms of line. He probably got an inside edge based on the speed of review....replays show bat and pad are very close. There is contact with the bat. Third umpire has deemed it was pad first, because we are going through to ball tracking....out. Plumb, smashing into middle and leg.

caught at short leg! Oh it's going down! Yasir Shah one away from a five-for and he's on a hat-trick too. Inside edge onto pad from Herath, lobs harmlessly for Shan Masood who leaps forward and completes the catch
good length, pushed through outside off stump. Sandakan does enough to cover the line and blocks it
good length at off stump, defended into the covers
full and tailed in at leg stump, flicked past midwicket off the inside half
back of a length, angled across off stump. Left alone
good length and down leg side, left alone
full outside off, chases it with the drive and gets it wide of mid-off
good length outside off stump, defended on the front foot
back of a length outside off, defended off the back foot
back of a length, spinning towards leg stump. Off the thigh guard and straight to short leg
good length wide outside off stump, offers the pad and kicks it away
back of a length at off stump, defended down the pitch
full outside off, looks to slice it through point. Beaten
back of a length outside off, on the back foot and pushed through the covers. Yasir can't stop the single, but cover should have been in
what a ball! Yorker intent on smashing middle stump and Dickwella has to leap and put all this weight on the bat as he keeps this out.
back of a length outside off stump, backs away to try and slash it, under-edges into the off side
good length outside, with some swing away. He pokes at it, beaten
back of a length, angles in at off stump and then straightens past the outside edge as he fends away from the body
back of a length at off stump, tucked off the hips to deep square
flies past leg gully. This is full at leg stump and he stabs at it. Gets a thick inside edge and it's too quick for that fielder. Dive to his left can't even get him close
well played. Brings the bat down with some force on this reverse sweep, and slaps it from a middle stump line through point
good length at middle stump, spins into his thigh guard and lobs over short leg
back of a length outside off, cops it on the back leg as he pushes deep into the crease
back of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
good length at off stump, steps down the track and flicks it to deep square
nearly chops it onto the stumps. Back of a length ball, turning away from off stump, but the No. 10 looks to punch off the back foot through midwicket. Inside edge onto his boot
back of a length at middle stump, defended into the point area off the back foot
good length outside off stump, fishes away from the body, beaten on the inside edge
overpitched outside off, caressed to deep point off the front foot. Doesn't take the single

well, I don't know what to call that. It's an attempted ramp that's supposed to send it over first slip. But this angles in at him, a short ball, as he tries to back away and execute the shot. Hits the inner half and flies to the keeper's left
backs away to try and squeeze this length ball past cover, doesn't succeed. Fielder keeps him on strike
Masood slow at square leg and can't stop the single. It was an attempted yorker, tapped into the leg side with soft hands
reverse sweep in the air but well over backward point. Tossed up outside off stump, gets down and under the shot. Lifts it over the fielder
skids through at ankle length and beats everyone. It was outside off though. He survives. This pitched back of a length and he was on the back foot. No chance it it had spun in towards the stumps
and now it bounces up at the thigh guard from a length. Pitching more or less in the same spot outside off as the last one
quicker one, good length and in at off stump. Defended off the back foot
good length, wide outside off. Beaten on flight as he steps out. Offers his leg and just manages to block it into the leg side
good length outside off stump, reverse sweep out to deep point
swings away from the left-hander, makes him push at it outside off. Beats the outside edge
full outside off stump, this time it's close to him and he gets bat on it and drives past extra cover
full and swinging away from off stump, whips across the line and gets a leading edge that flies through the gap between slip and gully
full at off stump, defended to mid-off
full and outside off stump, backs away to try and dab it through point. Beaten on the outside edge
cover stops the single. This was good length, in the the corridor. He leaped into the off side to try and poke it behind square on the leg, got a leading edge
good length at off stump, defended off the inside half of the bat
full outside off sutmp, well forward to defend into the pitch
back of a length outside off stump, defended off the back foot
slider, back of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
short and wide outside off stump, jumps onto the back foot and slaps this past point
good length, loops at middle, draws him forward and beats the outside edge. And the off stump.
glorious shot. Full outside off stump, leans in and opens the face at the last moment to get this between deep point and third man

dropped! Asad Shafiq again. Back of a length outside off stump, stabs at it, gets a thick edge that's straight at Shafiq at fly slip. It's dying on him slightly, but it's poor technique again as he grabs at it. It was headed towards his left foot and you can tell from a distance that those hands were hard and tense
back of a length outside off, blocked off the front foot
full outside off stump, leans in and checks the drive, pushes it wide of mid-off
full outside off stump, driven straight to cover
back of a length at off stump, exposes the stumps and chops at this, gets it straight to point
full outside leg stump, stretches forward and kicks it away
back of a length at leg stump, defended off the back foot in front of off
full outside leg stump, looks to dead bat this into the leg side. Leading edge into the covers
back of a length at leg stump, pushed to square leg off the back foot
overpitched on off stump, but he defends down the pitch

Sandakan! What has he done?! Oh Yasir Shah, another five wicket haul. He's so good at this, at tempting the poor tailenders into suddenly switching off. This is a top-spinner, short and wide outside off. Tests his discipline and Sandakan fails. Goes for the cut without any transfer of weight. Reaching out in the end from deep in the crease and he has bunted it straight to point
short one, down leg side from around the wicket. Stabs and gloves it fine
back of a length at off stump, defended into the off side
good length, angled in at off stump. Defended down the pitch

offcutter, back of a length and in at middle stump. Walks into the leg side and bunts this through the open point region. Wants to come back for the second but gully has done well to slide and keep that to one. Dickwella at the non-strikers end. Pradeep finishes on a king pair.

bowled him! Fielding pays dividends. And how. Pradeep doesn't last a ball. Full, swinging in viciously at the stumps and there's not so much as a half-stride from the No. 11. Smashed and Hasan Ali brings out the signature celebration
back of a length on leg stump, worked off his hips to midwicket for a quick single
full on leg stump, defended off his back foot.
short outside off, furiously cut behind square but Perera at gully dives magnificently to his left to stop the boundary
short on middle stump, gets inside the line of the ball and clips it off his hips to midwicket for a quick single
good length outside off stump, lets the ball go through to the keeper
back of a length on middle stump, defended off the back foot
full on off stump, prods forward and defends
full on middle stump, gets his big stride forward and defends
full just outside off, gets his front foot forward and gloves the ball towards the leg side
tossed up full outside off, no turn yet with the new ball, comfortably defended
back of a length outside off stump, rocks back and punches to mid on
tossed up full on off stump, slightly shuffle forward and tucked deep to the leg side. There's deep midwicket in that region
back of a length on off stump, gets close to the line and drops his hand to the ball
full on middle, driven back to Lakmal
full on middle stump, driven back to the bowler off the front foot
back of a length on middle stump, rocks back and defends from deep inside his crease
back of a length on middle, worked off his hips to short midwicket
short on middle, angles away from the left hander. Decides to have a poke at the wide delivery, cut straight to Perera near point
full wide outside off, Masood gets his stride in but defends for the turn. There's no spin, and the ball goes just past his outside edge
full on off stump, clipped off his toes but straight to short midwicket
a quicker ball this time, flat on off stump, defended to short mid on
tossed up full on off stump, whipped to short mid on once again
full on off stump, charges down and slices his drive to mid off. Calls early for the run

And there's the first wicket! Full just outside off, Aslam tries to defend it with the spin, but the ball is another straight one. Takes the outside edge, and loops to first slip. Karunaratne makes no mistake.
full on middle, gets inside the ball's line and clips it to deep midwicket for a couple
back of a length on off stump, drops his hands on the ball that swung slightly in. Goes to short midwicket

full on off stump, and it's a beauty! What shape! Full on off stump, Azhar Ali tries to defend it, anticipating the angle into his bat, but it goes straight through instead. The face of Azhar's bat closed too early, and the ball took the edge through to Dickwella. It's a duck.
pushed full on leg stump, allows Shafiq to get off the mark, clipped off his toes behind square to fine leg
short outside off stump, punches to cover and calls for one. The non-striker sends him back.
back of a length on middle, defended off the back foot
full outside off, spins into the right hander. The bat turns in his hand, as he drives it to mid on
tossed up full from outside off, but drifts and falls on off stump, driven down the ground
full just outside off, defended off the front foot, but edged along the ground to first slip. Reward for playing with soft hands
full on middle, clipped to short leg
full on off stump, prods forward and defends off the front foot
tossed up full on middle stump, defends it off the front foot
full on middle, steps back and works it off his hips to midwicket
back of a length wide outside off, drops his hands as he defends, and takes the outside edge of the blade. Goes past first slip to third man, and the fielder has to chase there from the infield
back of a length outside off, taps the ball square to point for an easy single
back of a length outside off stump, goes past the batsman's shouldering arms
good length on the nagging off stump line, leaves it well. Was too close to his body
short on middle, rocks back and works it with the bat's open face to short cover. Calls for one but Shafiq says no
full on leg stump, defended off the front foot
full outside off, driven on the up to mid off
full on middle and leg, clipped between midwicket and backward square
full wide outside off, punched back to Herath
full and wide outside off, the left-hander once again tries to defend it searching for turn, but there was none on offer. The ball goes straight through, and just past his outside edge
back of a length outside off, big stride forward to defend, but takes glove and pad and is slightly in the air. But falls in the middle of the deck, a few feet in front of short leg
good length outside off, jumps off the deck and hits it high on the bat. Shafiq went back and tried to defend that to point
back of a length just outside off, slight tail into the right hander, defended off the back foot
full outside off stump, punched on the up past Lakmal past mid on's left. Herath has to chase
back of a length outside off stump, rocks back and defends off the back foot
full outside off, driven to cover but the bat turns towards the leg side. Played square on the leg side
good length wide outside off, punched off the back foot to short cover. Got well inside the line of the ball
full outside off stump, defended off the front foot.
full outside off stump, charges down and drives against the spin to cover
full on off stump, small stride forward and defended with soft hands
good length on off stump, uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball and driven down the ground to long on
full on off stump, no spin this time and driven back to Herath
tossed up on leg stump, there's sharp spin, but Shafiq anticipated it. Plays it with watchful eyes as he defends that from under his eyes
full on middle, worked off his hips behind square to short fine leg
full on off stump, defended with a big stride forward
tossed up full on off stump, drifts into the left hander, who defends off the front foot

Dilruwan has struck! It's back of a length outside off stump, charges down but decides not to drive. Defends instead, and takes his pad, and then his glove. Lobs into the air, and short cover dives forward to complete a tough catch. Pakistan in trouble.
full on off stump, prods forward to defends but the ball spins slightly in, takes the inside edge and flies straight to short leg. Falls just short of Kaushal Silva

Another edge! Full outside off, gets his stride forward and defends. This time it's the blade's outside edge, falls just in front of the diving first-slip fielder, and trickles past him for three very useful runs
tossed up full, falls on middle and the flight deceives the batsman. Sharp turn away from the straight bat
full on middle and off, defended with soft hands
full on off stump, defends it once again
tossed up on off stump, gets inside the line of the ball and defends the ball back to Herath
full outside off, defended towards point off the front foot

another beauty. Back of a length on off stump, tries to defend off the back foot anticipating the spin into his body. But this is the one that straightens, and goes just past his outside edge through to the keeper.
full outside off, defended off the front foot
short on middle and off, rocks back and punches the ball past the non-striker. Dilruwan dives, short mid on dives, neither can hold on to it
back of a length on off stump, shuffles to the off side and works it off his hips to the leg side
good length just outside off, charges down and drives down the ground. Driven straight to Dilruwan, and the bowler throws it back quickly
back of a length on middle, tucked to deep square leg
full on off stump, defended back to Dilruwan
full on middle stump, charges down and whips it over midwicket's head to cow corner
tossed up full on middle, driven back to mid off

full on middle and leg, goes straight on and hits him on the pad, while he tries to defend. Loud appeal but the umpire says not out. Chandimal reviews. It's a big stride forward, and hits middle and leg, but it would've gone down the leg side. Survives.
back of a length on middle stump, pads the ball and it lobs straight to short leg. Obligatory appeal turned down
full on middle, big stride forward and defended
full on middle, defended once again but this time it takes the inside edge. Goes through past a nonexistent leg slip for a single. Was in the air
full just outside off, hurries the batsman into the backfoot defense
short on off stump, goes deep into the crease and works it to backward square. But the fielder cuts the single off
full on middle, tries to defend, and gets behind the line of the ball, but spins slightly too much, takes the edge of the bat and goes down the leg side for more runs
tossed full outside off, defended with soft hands
full on middle stump, defended to mid on

dropped! good length just outside off, prods forward to defend, but takes the outside edge of the bat and goes straight to Dickwella. Stays low and he can't hold onto it. Dickwella drops his head. And that's drinks.
tossed up at off stump, driven back to the bowler
length at middle stump, defended down the pitch
back of a length at middle stump, dropped behind square on the leg side, off the back foot
length at off stump, driven to mid-off
length at middle stump, defended off the inside half
good length and down leg side, looks to sweep and feathers a top edge fine
tossed up at middle stump, flicked to short midwicket

back of a length outside off, hands back in the crease and punches it through the open covers region. They pick up three...and then a throw comes in, ricochets off the stumps and gives them an extra run through mid-on
good length at off stump, looks to flick, gets a leading edge that goes wide of mid-off

caught behind! Niroshan Dickwella. No review from the batsman, that's the end of him. Dilruwan Perera pushes one through, no turn, outside off stump. Babar chases, stretches well forward and tries to bunt it without intent. If defence was the option, it was wide enough to leave. But he has seen so many turning in at him, that this was instinctive. Top class bowling
good length at leg stump, defended with soft hands
back of a length at middle stump. Punched past the non-striker and he steals a single
back of a length outside off, shoots at ankle length and beats Dickwella
back of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
good length at middle, steps down and chips this over square leg

caught at first slip! Karunaratne holds his cool as this one flies towards his face. It took off from back of a length, and it turned. Shafiq was in position for a cut, but he could only poke at it - similar to his dismissal in the first innings. Good catch
good length, angled down leg side. Beaten by flight after stepping out, but he follows it and flicks it towards long leg
good length at off stump, plays on the back foot and gets the defence off the inside half
good length at off stump, stretches out at it and gets an outside edge. First slip tumbles to his left
back of a length, arm ball at off stump. Defended off the back foot
back of a length at middle, defended off the outside half of the bat
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
good length, in at middle stump, defended down the pitch
full just outside off, defended firmly
full on off stump, shuffles onto the off side, gets down on one knee, and sweeps fine past the keeper for more runs. Expose two of the three stumps, there
back of a length just outside off, big stride forward and defends. But the ball hits his pad and lobs to silly point. Loud appeal from the infielders
full on off stump,defended off the front foot after charging down
full just outside off, straightened after pitching, Sarfraz was late to bring his bat down. Goes past him, though to Dickwella
full on leg, defended towards short leg
full just outside off, punched towards cover
full on off stump, shuffles down and drives to long off
full outside off, tries to paddle it square on the leg side but his front foot gets in the way of his shot. Hits straight onto his boot
back of a length just outside off, punched off the back foot to the bowler
tossed up full outside off stump, on drive to short midwicket
swept fine! Full outside off and once again Sarfraz is quick to get down on one knee. Ensures the sweep is fine, and beats the short fine-leg fielder inside the circle.
good length just outside off, charges down and pads it safely
full on middle stump, charges down to cut the spin and tentatively pokes the ball towards short midwicket
short and wide outside off, enough width to cut that, goes to point, but misfielded! Allows the extra run. Sarfraz slipped while completing his first run as well. Scrappy stuff
tossed full and wide outside off, prods forward with his feet but shoulders his arms eventually
full and wide outside off once again, straight through to the keeper's glove. No spin
full outside off, enough room to play the cut but the batsman has other plans. Shoulders his arms
full on off stump, driven on the up to mid on
full outside off, gently driven to mid on this time, allowing the single to be completed easily
full on middle and leg, punched back to Dilruwan
full on middle and leg, carefully defended back to the bowler
loopy, full outside off, tapped to cover for a single
full just outside off, defended with soft hands
tossed up outside off stump, defends it playing for the turn, but it goes straight through, goes millimeters away from his outside edge. Groans all around
short outside off, rocks back and punched to short cover, smart dive to the left from the fielder there. Saves atleast two
full on off stump, tucks the ball into the gap on the leg side in front of square and calls early for the single. 50 for Pakistan.
full just outside off, big stride forward and defended
full on middle and off, Sarfraz once again defends
back of a length on off stump, goes straight on and Sarfraz goes deep into the crease, moving towards the leg side, as he punches the ball to cover
back of a length just outside off, prods forward and goes past the batsman's defense. Just spins past the outside edge. Not the first time from Haris this innings
back of a length on middle, defended
full on off stump, driven to mid off and Sarfraz calls early for one. It's a close run, but it's not a direct hit and the batsman is safe

full outside off, Sarfraz gets his leg forward but the defense is down the wrong line. Hits the pads! And they all appeal. Not out says the umpire, but Chandimal wants the review. No contact with the bat, replays suggest. Pitched outside off, impact juuuuust outside off stump (umpire's call), but would've gone on to hit middle stump. Sarfraz survives, but Sri Lanka don't lose the review.
full outside off stump, defended off the front foot
full outside off, quick to pounce onto that. Swept furiously to deep midwicket. Hit too well, will only fetch him the single
back of a length on middle stump, slides down leg side as Dickwella has to dive to his left
back of a length outside off, angles into Sarfraz but he defends the ball from near his chest
fullish outside off, slight tail into the batsman, defended off the front foot as the ball trickles away to short midwicket. The bat turned in his hands. Good pace from Pradeep
back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to short cover
short outside off, angles into Sarfraz's body. Gets big onto the batsman, and he does well to drop his hands from near his chest, towards the leg side
back of a length outside off, tails in once again but Sarfraz is up to the challenge. Defended
Full on leg stump,makes it a full toss and it's muscled past midwicket for the first boundary of the innings!
full just outside off, defended straight back to the bowler
back of a length outside off stump, enough width for the batsman to cut it square. Goes between point and gully, both fielders give it a chase, but can't stop the third run
full outside off, spins slightly in but defended back to the bowler
back of a length just outside off, rocks back and punches it to short cover
full on middle, tucked towards short midwicket on the leg side. Sees the over out. Dilruwan has been wayward this over, first time all innings.
full and wide outside off, entices the batsman to drive and he obliges. Takes the outside edge, and it's in the air! Goes between first slip and wide gully for four very important runs.
short and wide outside off, pace not menacing enough to bother Haris. Tapped towards point
full and wide outside off, shuffles forward before punching down the ground to mid off
full and wide outside off, bunted down the ground to wide mid off
back of a length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket, but straight to the fielder
back of a length on middle, sees off the over by defending it off the backfoot with soft hands
back of a length on middle stump,, spins into the batsman's body sharply. He was quick to back away to the leg side, but the ball followed him. Punched off the back foot
back of a length outside off stump, goes deep and cuts late to point
full on off stump, driven down the ground to mid on
short outside off, backs away and cut square to deep point. A big chase for the infielders
full outside off, spins slightly away to the left hander, left alone
full on off stump, the wrong'un, stays low and forces the batsman to hurry. Somehow played to midwicket for a single. And that's Tea.
good length outside off, left alone
length at off stump, pushed past the non-striker off the back foot. Short midwicket couldn't get to it
back of a length, in at off stump. Backs away and looks to slap it through the off side. Mistimed. Finds cover point
full outside off, driven into the covers
good length outside off stump, left alone as it angles away
inside edge trickles past short leg. Doesn't quite get the stride out as he looks to defend outside off stump
good length at middle stump, steps out and swings hard at it. Manages to chip it over midwicket. Deep square leg runs to his left
good length outside off stump, keeps the sweep along the floor, finds fine leg
back of a length at off stump, defended off the back into the covers
back of a length at leg stump, defended off the back foot
bonus runs. Short and wide outside off stump, slashes at it and gets it off the outside half. It races past backward point
back of a length at off stump, defended off the outside half to point
full at leg stump, blocked on the front foot
tossed up at leg stump, he steps down and taps it straight to mid-on...and he knew there was a single there all along. Wonderful running as soon as he got bat to it
good length at leg stump, pushed into the leg side on the up
good length outside off stump, defended off the outside half
good length at off stump, defended down the pitch
good length at middle stump, looks to flick, but he's not to the pitch of the ball. Thick inside edge towards square leg
good length at off stump, defended down the pitch
tossed up at middle stump, steps out and skews the attempted slog to deep midwicket
good length at middle stump, defended on the front foot
short, starts outside off and spins away. Haris does well to withdraw from the cut
good length at off stump, defended into the off side
full at leg stump, defended to extra cover off the outside half
good length at leg stump, pushed into the leg side off the back foot

he's come down the pitch and missed it! Sarfraz is gone! Rangana Herath has taken gotten rid of the tailor. He's grabbed the cloth right out and ripped the seams apart. Sarfraz was stitching everything together. Pakistan finally seemed to have found control, but now it's wide open again. This was dipping at leg stump, good length. He stepped down and yorked himself. It hit his pad, deflected low to Dickwella's right. He was lucky as this hit his right pad and stayed right in the vicinity. Swooped down and broke the stumps as Sarfraz looked desperately to get back
good length at middle stump, defended on the front foot
length at middle, blocked
good length at leg stump, defended into the leg side
full at middle stump, pushed into the off side
good length at off stump, defended into the off side
good length at leg stump, defended into the leg side off the inside half of the bat
well fielded. Sandakan at fine leg, sprints to his left and gets his body behind this to stop it. Hasan picks this from middle stump and swivels to pull
full at leg stump, dabbed to midwicket off the front foot
good length at off stump, defended into the covers
good length, pushed down leg side. STays deep in the crease and tickles this fine

Nigel Llong nearly swept off his feet but there's no romance involved. Short leg takes catch that was lobbe off the pad. Then he fires at the non-strikers wicket and the umpire is in danger. Manages to get away. They get two runs. Hasan Ali wasn't watching as he walked back to the crease while Sri Lanka appealed. Good awareness, but he didn't hit the stumps
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
lbw appeal is turned down. This spins in at off stump and hits him outside the line, on the back leg, as he looks to defend
full at middle stump, driven wide of long-on, perfectly placed
full and pushed through at middle stump, shuffles across and dabs it past short midwcket
loud appeal but the umpire says this pitched outside. Full ball, he's looking to sweep, but can't get bat on it
good length at off stump, blocked on the front foot
huge appeal, no shot offered. He's struck outside off as he anticipates turn and plonks a leg forward.But this skids through. Wasn't straightening enough. Not reviewed
length at middle stump, pushed to midwicket on the up
back of a length at middle stump, shovelled past midwicket
good length at middle stump, defended down the pitch
back of a length at off stump, deep in the crease, punched to extra cover
full outside off stump, reaches out and flicks to short midwicket...who lets it through. Poor cricket
good length at off stump, pushed into the covers off the back foot
back of a length, spinning away from middle stump. Punches against the turn and beats Herath's dive. Down to long-on
back of a length at off stump, watches it closely, calmly pokes it wide of point
full at middle stump, tapped down the pitch
smash! I ain't afraid of you. Hasan Ali, plonks the front leg down, gets leg side of the ball and shapes to sweep. Except, he adjusts at the last moment for the turn and lifts it clean over long-off

trapped on the back leg, bang in front of off stump, and it's been given! He has reviewed this. But it's out of desperation. I don't see him surviving this. Pitches at a length on middle stump, straightens as he plays inside the line. Goes past the outside edge and gets the back thigh...there is no edge. There isn't too much turn. Pitched in line. Impact, in-line. Wickets - umpire's call. He's gone. Pakistan need their bowlers to win this for them now.
full at leg stump, tapped towards mid-on
short and wide outside off, no turn, skids through nicely as he punches it past the covers. Brings up the hundred
awful ball, short and wide outside off. Cut straight to point.

lbw appeal again, given not out. Good length, arm ball, pitches on middle and angles down. He's trapped on the back foot. It was going down and after leaving Sri Lanka's fans praying for 15 seconds, they say no to the review
good length at off stump, defended into the off side
exposes the leg stump and looks to sweep this length ball. Cops it on the front pad. Pitching outside
leading edge flies past silly point. He looks to close the face on this full ball on middle

shows leg stump, loses leg stump! A pump of the fist from the old pro. He's got Hasan Ali. Walks across to the off side, looks to sweep again. Herath pushes this through a little and it skids low and smashes into the leg stump
full at off stump, tapped to mid-off
good length, in at off stump, defended on the front foot
full at off stump, gets an outside edge that zings past silly point
good length at off stump, stretches forward to defend. Gets it off the inside half
full at off stump, defended into the off side
good length at off stump, defended off the outside half
full at middle stump, pushed into the leg side off the inside half
good length at off stump, defended to silly point
full at leg stump, tapped to midwicket
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
full at leg stump, puts a nervous foot forward and an entire nation holds its breath as the bat comes down very very late to defend this
good length at off stump, defended into the off side
chops it off the outside edge past slip. This was pushed through, back of a length and he manages to get a decent connection
full at leg stump, pushed into the leg side off the front foot
leg stump, dead-batted into the leg side
full outside off stump, leans into drive it to sweeper cover
good length outside off, defended into the off side
arm ball. Back of a length outside off stump, aimless poke at it away from the body. Beaten on the outside edge
back of a length, pushed through at middle stump. Goes deep in the crease and tucks it to fine leg
good length at off stump, solidly defended down the pitch
good length at off stump, defended down the pitch

Dickwella is screaming in agony after taking this down leg side. Llong says not out. But they've reviewed! Looks like a poor one. There was no sound, Dickwella was the only one appealing, and Ultra Edge shows nothing. Sri Lanka are out of reviews He was looking to push this on the front foot as it slid down leg.
good length at leg stump, dabs it into the off side and takes off for a run without calling...or even looking....at Amir. Sent back
length at middle stump, defended on the front foot
good length at leg stump. Pushes at it and gets an inside edge that rolls in front of Dilruwa Perera at short fine who picks it very late and gives away a run
good length at off stump, defended into the off side

ohhh goes everyone as Amir wanders down the pitch. There's time to go before the ball lands. And he's moving leg side. The ball is drifting towards off. The margin is tiny here, but miraculously he manages to reach it with his hands and chip it over mid-off
full at middle stump, flicked to short midwicket
short one on middle stump, deep in the crease, misses on the flick shot
full at leg stump, forward, and pokes to midwicket
good length at off stump, pushed into the off side
good length at off stump, pushes forward and dead-bats it down the pitch
length at off stump, comfortably defended on the front foot
good length, drifting away from off stump. Stretches forward and follows with his hands to dab this past first lip

bowled him! What a ball! Oh this is stunning from Herath to pick up ten wickets in the match and it's his 100th against Pakistan. Thirty-nine years and 197 days old. How many batsmen he might have done this to - draws him in outside off stump. Come here, he says, as he loops it wide. Amir takes the bait. Pushes forward and takes his time with it, because this is tossed right up. But this is Rangana. He gets it to dip. Well before Amir's stride is in. There's a gap between bat and pad. Herath has made a career out of it. Through his defence and hits the top of off
beats the outside edge. Full and drifting in at off stump, Abbas looks to block it, but he forget to put in a stride. Dickwella doesn't hold on
back of a length, coming in at off stump, spins rapidly past the outside edge
good length at off stump, defended into the off side
defends aerially but it's past silly point. Stretches forward and pokes at this full ball with hard hands
good length at middle stump, looks to push forward and defend. Gets it off the inside edge. Dickwella at it again, no one else appeals
length, pushed through outside off. Defended into the off side
tossed up at middle stump. Steps down, flicks to short midwicket

is that it?! Short leg dives low to his right and holds on. Out says the umpire. They review it....he has overstepped! Sri Lanka had erupted in joy, Dickwella had ripped the stumps out. It was a length ball on middle, he pushes forward at it and got an inside edge. But it's a no-ball. What scenes! Mendis, the catcher even aped Hasan Ali's celebration!
shot! Applause erupt in Abu Dhabi, in Pakistan's dressing room as Yasir drives this through the covers
steps out, reaches the pitch, hammers it hard. Back at the bowler
good length at middle stump, pushed to midwicket off the front foot
back of a length, at middle stump. watches it very closely as he defends on the back foot
good length at middle stump, defended off the inside half
full at middle stump, pushed down the pitch

this has to be out, surely! Lbw appeal, given out. Arm ball, length at off stump. He looks to cut it and misses by a long way. Reviewed, of course....but no chance. Nowhere near bat, and definitely smashing into the off stump. Pakistan's first loss in Abu Dhabi is sealed by their chief tormenter Rangana Herath. It's also his 400th wicket.
